Articles.Content: Did someone order a pizza?

(OdinYggd, this is more of a military roleplay.)

I found another hill, and make it for sale. My irradiated and "for sale" hills.
I purchased your hill. My purchased, newly-founded hill.

> 
> (OdinYggd, this is more of a military roleplay.)

Indeed, it's supposed to be casual more than any kind of roleplay. 

Right, I'll just be here.
I found more hills on the mountains and right now, it's for sale. My irradiated, "for sale", and high-up hills.
This hill looks perfect for a secret research base. Right where nobody will expect one.
All your hills now belong to us!

Moderator barbeque on the hill..!

![z8GBIeO.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/z8GBIeO.jpg)

I made the original, everyone is blasted by my awesome power.

My hill.
My forum Kraken wishes to discuss this matter.

\*crashes into the moderator's hill in a KnÃƒÂ¶rr and runs ashore wearing Viking clothing and armour\*

Barbecue? I'll have the spam spam spam bacon steak and spam please!

Who invited the crazy lady with the antique armor?

\*drops his whiskey, breaking the bottle\*

Daww. I christen this ground, Virginia!
\*leaves and returns in a North Vietnamese uniform and proceeds to dig tunnels under Virginia\*

\*flies the dalek parliament ship and entire fleet over the world and begins the bombardment destroying all life and then when the bombardment is over I glide effortlessly up the hill in my MK3 travel machine and do the Dalek victory dance!\*

 MY CRATOR FILLED HILL PLANET!

Excuse me just a moment.

THIS STATEMENT IS FALSE. 

DOES A SET OF ALL SETS CONTAIN ITSELF

NEW MISSION: REJECT THIS MISSION

\*takes a seat on the hill as your brains melt\*
Daleks aren't robots ^.^

blows up the hill and builds a new one on Laythe.

 My extraterrestrial Hill!

I Make A SpaceShip With Lasers And make It Orbit Laythe And then i proceed to Shoot the Hill With Lasers.

My Slightly Burnt Hill.

Rule violation. Hill must reside on Kerbal!!

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/z8rYotiiFP8?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Fixed it for me!

I Orbit Laythe With A SpaceShip And Use Its Sunbeam lasers to shoot the Hill Which Destroys Everything Except the Hill.

My Burned Hill.

EDIT:I Posted This When My Previous Post was loading and i thought that the post thingy or something was broken so i accidently posted 2 of the same things. So Just Ignore this Post.

**Edited <time datetime="2013-04-28T22:19:56Z" title="04/28/2013 10:19  PM" data-short="11 yr">April 28, 2013</time> by Lirex132**
  
Messing up
blows up kerbin - built a new hill on the mun, now known as a planet.
I go back in time and kill mincespy, rendering all of the above void. The hill is back to normal, and i'm building a bunker made of diamond on it. My hill.
Move over. I've got a rocket to launch from this hill.
About 190 light years from Kerbol, around the orbit of Earth, I built a moon base on a hill. My hill on the Moon.
I call in Chuck Norris. My everything.
